attributes.action: I Am AGAINST Muslim and Hindu Bank Holidays in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently a petition exists with 120,188 signatures for petitioners to ask that Britain recognise the Muslim and Hindu holidays of Eid and Diwali here in Great Britain.

This is the ONLY petition to protest against this idea.
If an e-petition gets overs 100,000 signatures it can be debated in the House of Commons.

In Great Britain we don't even have a Bank Holiday for St. Georges Day!
 Please sign and share if you are AGAINST the notion of Muslim and Hindu Bank Holidays in the U.K Keep Britain BRITISH.
Thank you,
